hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT rc FROM RouteCollection rc, StopTime stopTime WHERE stopTime.stop = :stop AND stopTime.trip.route IN elements(rc.routes) GROUP BY rc.id.agencyId, rc.id.id
SELECT rc FROM RouteCollection rc left join rc.routes as route WHERE route in (:routes)
SELECT rc.id FROM RouteCollection rc, Trip trip WHERE trip.serviceId = :serviceId AND trip.route IN elements(rc.routes) GROUP BY rc.id.agencyId, rc.id.id
SELECT trip.id FROM RouteCollection rc, Trip trip WHERE trip.serviceId = :serviceId AND trip.route IN elements(rc.routes) AND rc.id = :routeId
SELECT trip.shapeId FROM StopTime stopTime, Trip trip WHERE stopTime.stop = :stop AND stopTime.trip = trip GROUP BY trip.shapeId.agencyId, trip.shapeId.id
